alert.note: Alert for Howell; Oregon; Shannon; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 9:18PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Shannon, northern Howell, southeastern Texas and northwestern Oregon Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 918 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Cabool to near Willow Springs. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ozark National Scenic Riverways... Echo Bluff State Park... Current River State Park... Mountain View... Willow Springs... Winona... Birch Tree... Eminence... Pomona... Summersville... Montier... Peace Valley... Teresita... Midridge... Arroll... Elk Creek... Eunice... Alley Spring... Hartshorn... Clear Springs... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for south central Missouri.
